segments.text: Excuse me , sir . What would you like to eat , Chinese food or western food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have Chinese food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going to have this set course or have dinner in the dining room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please put down the table in front of you . It's more comfortable that way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you . So nice you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . What would you like to drink , milk , tea , coffee , orange juice or iced water ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want a cup of bean milk . Do you have any ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , here you are . Enjoy your meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . Oh , excuse me . Can I take two value meals ? And I want some chili paste .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry to bother you . I want to know what kind of meat it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is beef . Do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . Please press that button if you need any help .
segments.speaker: S1
